RelatedSentence: Statistics Finland figures for March show that the number of overnight stays by Russian visitors was 14 percent lower than in March 2013 .
The total number of overnight stays was down by 7.7 percent , indicating a greater decline among Russians than among visitors in general .
The figures show regional differences in Russian visits .

A1: a drop in visits from Russians
RelatedSentence: All other regions showed a drop in visits from Russians .
